title: 8.10 and Kindred
body: So hey riot avid kindred player here, quick question while it's nice you give us random QoL changes that we should've had since release like this patch. Can you maybe not ignore our core mechanics and make our mark spawn with the scuttles seeing as they're pretty much dead by 2:20 now? Would be fantastic, and i'm aware of the response "We have other kindred changes in the works" Cool, but how about making it so we don't get even more screwed over with our marks more than we normally do like what happened this patch. It's almost never gonna be viable to wait for the Mark to become a scuttle when they give that much xp with out being jumped on or forced to take it already.

This passive pve mark "assist" mechanic should've been inherent within kindred's design from the start, as you mentioned. I do think that riot needs to step up Kindred QoL buffs, they've been in an awkward spot for a while. Not power-wise, more that they just don't feel *good* in a lot of situations. I've made thread after thread for well over a year now on these boards and have yet to get so much as a passing nod by a riot member to show that they've even seen my posts.

Took me forever to get stacks.  These changes make getting them from monsters more difficult, and with ganking from the jungle intentionally nerfed, this change makes getting them from kills harder.  Took me forever to get to 4 last game.
